name: strikkeskolens hue
notes:
strikkeskolens hue is a very simple hat, worked as a long tube in stockinette stitch with decreases for the crown.

the hat is folded after knitting to give three layers of fabric covering the ears, and only a single layer on the head. i have made a video tutorial showing how to fold it.


en fin, helt enkel hue, som er nem at strikke. jeg har lavet en video, som tydeligt viser monteringen af huen - ombukket sys på en særlig måde, for at opnå den rette tykkelse.
